title: Lure
medium: Bronze with string, forged bronze hook, and pewter sinker
dimensions: Figure 34 1/2 x 29 x 18 1/2" (87.6 x 73.7 x 47 cm), string with hook and sinker 157" (398.8 cm) long. Overall dimensions variable
